title: I need clarification from Riot on this matter
body:
I have been banned from league on my main account, I received an email saying,

**Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Mon Feb 22 22:22:22 UTC 9002**

Does that mean I am banned until febuary 2017 or febuary 9002? 
Please can a Rioter clarify this for me?
, Thanks!

replies.body: This is a year 9002 ban code, which is generally indicative of a permanent suspension for scripting/unauthorized 3rd party applications that provide inherent gameplay advantages associated with your account. If you believe that this suspension was applied in error, you can submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support who can review this case again. If you have any additional questions, please let me know!

> This is a year 9002 ban code, which is generally indicative of a permanent suspension for scripting/unauthorized 3rd party applications that provide inherent gameplay advantages associated with your account. If you have any additional questions, please let me know!

Yeah I am still unclear since this was a first offense case. Only reply I got from my ticket was a bot copy and paste reply yet they are accusing me of botting. So does the ban mean until next year or 9002? This is really unfair tbh

> [{quoted}](name=Rusty Spoons,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=IIdQYplh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-15T09:29:36.966+0000)
>
> Yeah I am still unclear since this was a first offense case. Only reply I got from my ticket was a bot copy and paste reply yet they are accusing me of botting. So does the ban mean until next year or 9002? This is really unfair tbh

Yeah, this is a ban until the year 9002 (effectively a permanent suspension). Riot has a zero tolerance policy with regards to scripting, as it's clear that inherent and unfair gameplay advantages are extremely harmful for competitive and fun play.
